message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. What do you say?
You got 90%, now it's my turn to try for a better deal!
Okay, I'll be reasonable.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  We can avoid more inflation.
You're being generous, but I think I can do better. I'll take a smaller share this time.
We're both losing money with this inflation. Let's just split it 50/50 and be done with it.
